title: Easy Chicken Casserole
description: An easy chicken casserole with a cracker topping made with chicken cooked in a creamy condensed soup sauce for a meal the whole family will love.
steps: Fill a large pot with water; bring to a boil. Cook chicken in boiling water until no longer pink inside, 20 to 30 minutes. Chop chicken into bite-sized pieces and place in a 9x13-inch baking dish.
Combine condensed soup, sour cream, onion, and mushrooms in a bowl. Pour mixture over chicken and top with crumbled crackers.
Cover and bake in the preheated oven until top is lightly browned, about 30 minutes.
